name: Restaurant Tycoon: Mattami
description:
♪ Mattami is a restaurant tycoon game where you start with a tiny humble place and work your way up.

♫ Take hold of your staff and control their actions then automate their actions as the number of staff grows larger.

♪ You can design your restaurant however you like, choosing placements for your equipment (like tables, chairs and stoves...) and their orientation. You also get to choose how your place is partitioned by placing walls. You start with a small space, but you can expand it later on.

♫ The 3D Graphics are zen, modern looking and very attractive. But you remain in charge of making your restaurant look nice, by designing it in a way that your items match in colors or make interesting patterns.

♪ Pick how many waiters and chefs to hire. But be careful !! Staff charge coins for every minute they work. So be wise on how many of them you need or your restaurant might go bankrupt !!

♫ You can upgrade specific attributes to the staff to improve their productivity, each skill point will mean an increase in that worker's salary.

♪ Manage your money carefully, and find new ways to attract more customers through improving the restaurant's popularity (and making discounts WIP).

♫ Select the meals that will served by buying their specific ingredients. In order to be smart on how you manage your budget, always keep an eye on your ingredient supply.

♪ Watch the popularity of your restaurant and make sure that it's maximized for a bigger influx of customers.

Next update will have:
- Better staff control
- Work Area Assignment for Staff (choose in which parts of the restaurant a staff can walk to)
- Assign an appliance exclusively for one or a number of staff 
- Ovens/Bakeries
- More plates
- More UI improvements 

Contact:
- If you find any bugs or would like to give your feedback please post on the discussion board or email: contactathomield@gmail.com

Note: This game is still in development, bugs are expected and some features are still to be implemented.

Known issues:
- Not tested on high DPI resolution screens but should work. (If UI is too small you can adjust it in the settings tab)
- Not tested on Linux or MacOS
- A customer might get served twice by mistake
- Waiters might overlap on the same counter top when placing plate candidate (this will erase one of the plate candidates)
